resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108572</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108572</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207023</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A Century of Lawmaking for a New Nation, U.S. Congressional Documents and Debates, 1774-1873</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Jahrhundert der Gesetzgebung für eine neue 
Nation, VEREINIGTE STAATEN Kongreßdokumente und Debatten, 1774-1873</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un siècle de la législation pour une nouvelle 
nation, des documents des ETATS-UNIS et des discussions 
congressionnels, 1774-1873</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um século do lawmaking para uma nação nova, uns
originais de ESTADOS UNIDOS e uns debates congressionais, 1774-1873</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un secolo di legislazione per una nuova nazione, i
documenti degli STATI UNITI ed i dibattiti congressuali, 1774-1873</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας αιώνας lawmaking για ένα νέο έθνος, 
ΑΜΕΡΙΚΑΝΙΚΑ του Κογκρέσου έγγραφα και τις συζητήσεις, 1774-1873</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un siglo de la legislación para una nueva 
nación, los documentos de ESTADOS UNIDOS y los discusiones del 
congreso, 1774-1873</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">includes documents from the Continental Congress, the Constitutional Convention and ratification debates, and the first two federal congresses. These documents record American history in the words of those who built our government.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schließt Dokumente vom kontinentalen Kongreß, 
die konstitutionellen Versammlung- und Bestätigungdebatten und die 
ersten zwei Bundeskongresse ein. Diese Dokumente speichern 
amerikanische Geschichte in den Wörtern von denen, die unsere 
Regierung aufbauten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">inclut des documents du congrès continental, les 
discussions constitutionnelles de convention et de ratification, et 
les deux premiers congrès fédéraux. Ces documents 
enregistrent l'histoire américaine dans les mots de ceux qui ont 
établi notre gouvernement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">inclui originais do congress continental, os 
debates constitutional da convenção e do ratification, e os 
primeiros dois congresses federais. Estes originais gravam o 
history americano nas palavras daqueles que construíram nosso 
governo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">include i documenti dal congresso continentale, i 
dibattiti costituzionali di ratifica e di convenzione ed i primi due 
congressi federali. Questi documenti registrano la storia 
americana nelle parole di coloro che ha sviluppato il nostro governo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιλαμβάνει τα έγγραφα από το ηπειρωτικό συνέδριο, 
τις συνταγματικές συζητήσεις Συνθηκών και επικύρωσης, και τα 
πρώτα δύο ομοσπονδιακά συνέδρια. Αυτά τα έγγραφα 
καταγράφουν την αμερικανική ιστορία στις λέξεις εκείνοι που 
έχτισαν την κυβέρνησή μας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">incluye documentos del congreso continental, los 
discusiones constitucionales de la convención y de la ratificación, 
y los primeros dos congresos federales. Estos documentos 
registran historia americana en las palabras de los que construyeron 
nuestro gobierno.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207023</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108572</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/a-century-of-lawmaking-for-a-new-nation-u-s-congressional-documents-and-debates-1774-1873</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
